p: After 24 h of astrocyte treatment with the extract, 10 μl of MTT working solution (5 mg/mL) was added and then incubated in a CO 2 incubator for 3 h at 37 ºC. The medium was removed, and the formazan crystals formed were dissolved by adding 200 μl of DMSO and incubated in the dark inside a CO 2 incubator for 1 h at 37 ºC. Finally, the purple color of the dissolved formazan crystals was quantified in a plate reader (Infinite 200Pro Tecan, Switzerland) at 650 nm.
